price: Tàbí (ẹ̀yin ń wí pé): “Ó mú nínú n̄ǹkan tí Ó dá ní ọmọbìnrin (fúnra Rẹ̀). Ó sì fi àwọn ọmọkùnrin ṣa ẹ̀yin lẹ́ṣà.”
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
